title: Garlic Butter Pasta
description: Simple pasta tossed with garlic-infused butter and parmesan cheese. Perfect for a quick weeknight dinner.
instructions: ["Bring a large pot of salted water to boil","Cook spaghetti according to package instructions until al dente","Reserve 1 cup of pasta water before draining","In a large skillet, melt butter over medium heat","Add minced garlic and sauté for 1-2 minutes until fragrant","Add drained pasta to the skillet","Toss pasta with garlic butter, adding pasta water as needed","Stir in grated parmesan cheese","Season with salt and pepper","Garnish with fresh parsley and serve"]

title: Aglio e Olio
description: Classic Italian pasta with garlic, olive oil, and red pepper flakes. A simple yet flavorful dish.
instructions: ["Bring a large pot of salted water to boil","Cook spaghetti according to package instructions until al dente","Reserve 1 cup of pasta water before draining","Heat olive oil in a large skillet over medium heat","Add sliced garlic and sauté for 2 minutes until golden","Add red pepper flakes and cook for 30 seconds","Add drained pasta and toss to coat","Add pasta water as needed to create a light sauce","Stir in fresh parsley","Season with salt and pepper and serve"]

title: Cacio e Pepe
description: Roman pasta dish with pecorino cheese and black pepper. Creamy and peppery perfection.
instructions: ["Bring a large pot of salted water to boil","Cook spaghetti according to package instructions until al dente","Reserve 2 cups of pasta water before draining","Toast black pepper in a large dry skillet for 1 minute","Add 1 cup of pasta water to the skillet","Add drained pasta and toss vigorously","Remove from heat and add grated pecorino cheese gradually","Toss continuously, adding more pasta water as needed","The cheese should melt and create a creamy sauce","Serve immediately with extra cheese and pepper"]

title: Simple Marinara Spaghetti
description: Classic tomato sauce with garlic and basil over spaghetti. A timeless Italian favorite.
instructions: ["Bring a large pot of salted water to boil for pasta","Heat olive oil in a large saucepan over medium heat","Add minced garlic and sauté for 1 minute until fragrant","Add crushed tomatoes and stir well","Season with salt and pepper","Simmer sauce for 15-20 minutes, stirring occasionally","Meanwhile, cook spaghetti until al dente","Tear basil leaves and add to sauce","Drain pasta and toss with marinara sauce","Serve with extra basil and parmesan if desired"]

title: Pesto Pasta
description: Pasta coated in fresh basil pesto sauce. Aromatic and vibrant green.
instructions: ["Bring a large pot of salted water to boil","Cook pasta according to package instructions until al dente","Reserve 1 cup of pasta water before draining","Drain pasta and return to pot","Add pesto and toss to coat evenly","Add pasta water gradually to loosen sauce if needed","Drizzle with olive oil","Top with grated parmesan cheese","Season with salt if needed","Serve immediately"]

title: Buttered Egg Noodles
description: Simple egg noodles tossed with butter and herbs. Comforting and easy.
instructions: ["Bring a large pot of salted water to boil","Cook egg noodles according to package instructions","Drain noodles well","Return noodles to pot","Add butter and toss until melted and coated","Stir in fresh parsley","Season with salt and pepper","Serve immediately as a side or main dish"]

title: Mac and Cheese
description: Creamy macaroni and cheese with a rich cheese sauce. Classic comfort food.
instructions: ["Bring a large pot of salted water to boil","Cook macaroni until al dente, drain and set aside","In the same pot, melt butter over medium heat","Whisk in flour to create a roux","Cook for 1-2 minutes, stirring constantly","Gradually whisk in milk","Cook until sauce thickens, about 5 minutes","Remove from heat and stir in shredded cheddar","Add cooked macaroni and stir to coat","Season with salt and pepper and serve"]

title: Lemon Parmesan Pasta
description: Light pasta with lemon zest, parmesan, and a touch of cream. Bright and refreshing.
instructions: ["Bring a large pot of salted water to boil","Cook spaghetti until al dente","Reserve 1 cup pasta water before draining","In a large skillet, melt butter over medium heat","Add lemon zest and juice","Add cream and bring to a simmer","Add drained pasta and toss","Stir in parmesan cheese","Add pasta water if needed to loosen sauce","Garnish with parsley and serve"]

title: Tomato Basil Pasta
description: Fresh tomatoes, basil, and garlic tossed with pasta. Simple and summery.
instructions: ["Bring a large pot of salted water to boil","Cook pasta until al dente","Meanwhile, heat olive oil in a large skillet","Add minced garlic and sauté for 1 minute","Add halved cherry tomatoes","Cook for 5-7 minutes until tomatoes soften","Drain pasta and add to skillet","Tear basil leaves and add to pasta","Toss everything together","Season with salt and pepper and serve"]

title: Creamy Parmesan Pasta
description: Rich and creamy pasta with parmesan cheese. Indulgent and satisfying.
instructions: ["Bring a large pot of salted water to boil","Cook fettuccine until al dente","Meanwhile, melt butter in a large skillet","Add minced garlic and sauté for 1 minute","Pour in heavy cream and bring to a simmer","Cook for 5-7 minutes until slightly thickened","Stir in grated parmesan cheese","Drain pasta and add to cream sauce","Toss to coat evenly","Season with salt and pepper and serve"]

title: Pasta with Olive Oil and Herbs
description: Minimalist pasta with high-quality olive oil and fresh herbs. Simple elegance.
instructions: ["Bring a large pot of salted water to boil","Cook spaghetti until al dente","Reserve 1 cup pasta water before draining","Drain pasta and return to pot","Drizzle with olive oil and toss","Add chopped fresh herbs","Add a splash of pasta water to create a light coating","Season generously with salt and pepper","Serve immediately"]

title: Simple Carbonara
description: Classic Roman pasta with eggs, cheese, and crispy bacon. Creamy without cream.
instructions: ["Bring a large pot of salted water to boil","Cook spaghetti until al dente","Meanwhile, cook diced bacon in a skillet until crispy","In a bowl, whisk eggs with grated parmesan and black pepper","Reserve 2 cups pasta water before draining","Drain pasta and add to skillet with bacon","Remove from heat","Quickly stir in egg mixture, tossing constantly","Add pasta water gradually to create creamy sauce","Serve immediately with extra cheese and pepper"]

title: Pasta Primavera

title: Tuna Pasta

title: Cheesy Baked Pasta
description: Pasta baked with cheese until golden and bubbly. Comfort food at its best.
instructions: ["Preheat oven to 180°C (350°F)","Bring a large pot of salted water to boil","Cook penne until just al dente, drain","In a large bowl, mix pasta with tomato sauce","Add half of the mozzarella and cheddar","Season with salt and pepper","Transfer to a greased baking dish","Top with remaining cheese and parmesan","Drizzle with olive oil","Bake for 20-25 minutes until golden and bubbly"]

title: Garlic Parmesan Fettuccine

title: Pasta with Cherry Tomatoes

title: Turkey Club Sandwich
description: Triple-decker sandwich with turkey, bacon, and vegetables. Hearty lunch.
instructions: ["Cook bacon until crispy","Toast all bread slices","Spread mayonnaise on all slices","On first slice: layer lettuce and turkey","Add second slice of bread","Layer bacon and tomato","Top with third slice","Secure with toothpicks and cut into quarters"]

title: Chicken Salad
description: Creamy chicken salad with celery. Perfect for sandwiches or lettuce wraps.
instructions: ["Dice cooked chicken into small pieces","Finely dice celery and onion","In a bowl, mix chicken, celery, and onion","Add mayonnaise and lemon juice","Season with salt and pepper","Stir until well combined","Refrigerate for at least 10 minutes","Serve on bread, crackers, or lettuce"]

title: Tuna Salad
description: Classic tuna salad with mayo. Quick protein-packed meal.
instructions: ["Drain tuna completely","Flake tuna with a fork in a bowl","Dice celery and red onion finely","Add mayonnaise and lemon juice to tuna","Add celery and onion","Season with salt and pepper","Mix well until combined","Serve on bread, crackers, or salad greens"]

title: Caprese Salad
description: Fresh mozzarella, tomatoes, and basil. Simple Italian elegance.
instructions: ["Slice tomatoes and mozzarella into rounds","Arrange alternating slices on a platter","Tuck basil leaves between slices","Drizzle with olive oil","Drizzle with balsamic vinegar","Season with salt and pepper","Serve immediately at room temperature"]

title: Caesar Salad
description: Crisp romaine with creamy Caesar dressing. Restaurant classic.
instructions: ["Wash and dry romaine lettuce","Chop into bite-sized pieces","Place in a large bowl","Add Caesar dressing and toss to coat","Add most of the parmesan and toss again","Top with croutons","Garnish with remaining parmesan","Squeeze lemon juice over top and add black pepper"]

title: Greek Salad
description: Fresh vegetables with feta and olives. Mediterranean favorite.
instructions: ["Dice cucumbers and tomatoes","Thinly slice red onion","Combine vegetables in a large bowl","Add olives and crumbled feta","Whisk olive oil, lemon juice, and oregano","Pour dressing over salad","Season with salt","Toss gently and serve"]

title: Avocado Toast
description: Creamy avocado on crispy toast. Modern breakfast/lunch staple.
instructions: ["Toast bread until golden and crispy","Halve and pit avocados","Scoop flesh into a bowl","Mash with a fork","Add lemon juice and salt","Mix well","Spread avocado on toast","Drizzle with olive oil and sprinkle with red pepper flakes"]

title: Chicken Wrap
description: Grilled chicken wrapped with vegetables. Portable lunch.
instructions: ["Warm tortillas slightly if desired","Lay tortillas flat","Spread ranch dressing in the center","Layer lettuce, chicken, and tomato","Season with salt","Fold in sides and roll tightly","Cut in half diagonally","Serve immediately or wrap for later"]

title: Turkey and Cheese Wrap
description: Simple deli-style wrap. Quick lunch option.
instructions: ["Lay tortillas flat","Spread mayonnaise over tortillas","Layer turkey slices in the center","Add cheese slices","Top with lettuce","Season with salt","Roll tightly, folding in sides","Cut in half and serve"]

title: Simple Garden Salad
description: Fresh mixed greens with vegetables. Light and healthy.
instructions: ["Wash and dry mixed greens","Place in a large salad bowl","Slice cucumber and halve cherry tomatoes","Shred carrots","Thinly slice red onion","Add all vegetables to greens","Drizzle with dressing just before serving","Toss well and season with salt"]

title: Egg Salad Sandwich
description: Creamy egg salad on bread. Classic comfort food.
instructions: ["Boil eggs for 10 minutes","Cool in ice water and peel","Chop eggs into small pieces","Mix with mayonnaise and mustard","Add diced celery","Season with salt and pepper","Refrigerate for at least 10 minutes","Serve on bread with lettuce if desired"]

title: Ham and Cheese Sandwich
description: Simple deli sandwich. Quick and satisfying.
instructions: ["Lay bread slices flat","Spread mustard on all slices","Layer ham on 2 slices","Add cheese slices","Top with lettuce and tomato","Season with salt","Close sandwiches with remaining bread","Cut in half and serve"]

title: Peanut Butter Banana Sandwich
description: Sweet and creamy sandwich. Great for kids and adults.
instructions: ["Spread peanut butter on all bread slices","Slice bananas into rounds","Layer banana slices on 2 bread slices","Drizzle with honey if using","Close sandwiches with remaining bread","Cut in half and serve"]

title: Chicken Noodle Soup
description: Classic comfort soup with chicken and egg noodles. Perfect for cold days.
instructions: ["Heat olive oil in a large pot over medium heat","Sauté diced onion, carrots, and celery for 5 minutes","Add minced garlic and cook for 1 minute","Pour in chicken broth","Bring to a boil","Add diced chicken and egg noodles","Reduce heat and simmer for 15 minutes","Season with salt and pepper","Stir in fresh parsley","Serve hot"]

title: Tomato Soup
description: Creamy tomato soup. Perfect with grilled cheese.
instructions: ["Melt butter in a large pot over medium heat","Sauté onion for 5 minutes until soft","Add minced garlic and cook for 1 minute","Add crushed tomatoes and vegetable broth","Stir in basil and sugar","Bring to a boil, then reduce heat","Simmer for 15 minutes","Use immersion blender to puree until smooth","Stir in heavy cream","Season with salt and serve"]

title: Egg Drop Soup
description: Light Chinese soup with silky egg ribbons. Quick and comforting.
instructions: ["Bring chicken broth to a boil in a pot","Mix cornstarch with 3 tbsp cold water","Add cornstarch mixture to boiling broth","Stir until slightly thickened","Add soy sauce and grated ginger","Beat eggs in a bowl","Slowly drizzle eggs into soup while stirring","Remove from heat","Stir in sesame oil","Garnish with green onions and serve"]

title: Simple Ramen Bowl
description: Quick ramen with egg and vegetables. Better than instant.
instructions: ["Bring chicken broth to a boil","Add minced garlic and grated ginger","Add soy sauce","Add ramen noodles and cook for 3-4 minutes","Meanwhile, soft-boil eggs for 6 minutes","Peel eggs and halve them","Divide noodles and broth between bowls","Top with halved eggs","Drizzle with sesame oil","Garnish with green onions"]

title: Chicken Rice Soup
description: Hearty soup with chicken and rice. One-pot comfort meal.
instructions: ["Heat olive oil in a large pot","Sauté onion, carrots, and celery for 5 minutes","Add minced garlic and cook for 1 minute","Add diced chicken and cook until no longer pink","Pour in chicken broth","Add rice","Bring to a boil, then reduce heat","Simmer for 20 minutes until rice is tender","Season with salt and pepper","Serve hot"]

title: Creamy Potato Soup
description: Rich and creamy potato soup. Hearty comfort food.
instructions: ["Melt butter in a large pot","Sauté onion for 5 minutes","Add minced garlic and cook for 1 minute","Add diced potatoes and chicken broth","Bring to a boil, then reduce heat","Simmer for 20 minutes until potatoes are soft","Use potato masher to partially mash potatoes","Stir in heavy cream and cheese","Cook until cheese melts","Season with salt and pepper and serve"]

title: Miso Soup
description: Traditional Japanese soup with tofu. Light and savory.
instructions: ["Bring water to a boil in a pot","Soak dried seaweed in warm water for 5 minutes","Reduce heat to low","Add a small amount of hot water to miso paste in a bowl","Whisk until smooth","Add miso mixture to pot, do not boil","Add cubed tofu and drained seaweed","Heat through for 2-3 minutes","Garnish with green onions","Serve immediately"]

instructions: ["Heat olive oil in a large pot","Add minced garlic and cumin, cook for 1 minute","Pour in chicken broth and canned tomatoes","Add black beans and corn","Bring to a boil, then reduce heat","Add shredded chicken","Simmer for 15 minutes","Season with salt and lime juice","Serve topped with crushed tortilla chips"]

title: Simple Lentil Soup
description: Protein-rich lentil soup. Healthy and filling.
instructions: ["Heat olive oil in a large pot","Sauté onion, carrots, and celery for 5 minutes","Add minced garlic and cumin, cook for 1 minute","Add rinsed lentils","Pour in vegetable broth","Bring to a boil, then reduce heat","Simmer for 25-30 minutes until lentils are tender","Season with salt and pepper","Serve hot"]

title: Broccoli Cheddar Soup
description: Creamy cheese soup with broccoli. Comfort in a bowl.
instructions: ["Melt butter in a large pot","Sauté onion for 5 minutes","Add minced garlic and cook for 1 minute","Stir in flour to create a roux","Gradually whisk in chicken broth","Add broccoli florets","Simmer for 15 minutes until broccoli is tender","Use immersion blender to partially blend","Stir in cream and cheddar cheese","Season with salt and pepper and serve"]

title: Scrambled Eggs
description: Fluffy scrambled eggs. Perfect breakfast protein.
instructions: ["Crack eggs into a bowl","Add milk, salt, and pepper","Whisk until well combined","Melt butter in a non-stick skillet over medium-low heat","Pour in egg mixture","Let sit for 20 seconds","Gently push eggs from edges to center","Continue until eggs are just set but still moist","Remove from heat immediately","Serve hot"]

title: Classic Pancakes
description: Fluffy homemade pancakes. Weekend breakfast favorite.
instructions: ["In a bowl, mix flour, baking powder, sugar, and salt","In another bowl, whisk milk, egg, and melted butter","Pour wet ingredients into dry ingredients","Stir until just combined, do not overmix","Heat a griddle or skillet over medium heat","Pour 1/4 cup batter for each pancake","Cook until bubbles form on surface, about 2 minutes","Flip and cook another 2 minutes until golden","Serve with syrup or toppings"]

title: French Toast
description: Crispy-edged French toast. Sweet breakfast treat.
instructions: ["Whisk eggs, milk, cinnamon, and sugar in a shallow dish","Heat butter in a large skillet over medium heat","Dip bread slices in egg mixture, coating both sides","Let excess drip off","Place in hot skillet","Cook for 3-4 minutes per side until golden","Serve hot with syrup, fruit, or powdered sugar"]

title: Cheese Omelette
description: Fluffy omelette with melted cheese. Quick protein breakfast.
instructions: ["Whisk eggs, milk, salt, and pepper in a bowl","Melt butter in a non-stick skillet over medium heat","Pour in half the egg mixture","Tilt pan to spread evenly","Cook until edges set, about 2 minutes","Sprinkle half the cheese on one side","Fold omelette in half","Cook 1 more minute","Slide onto plate","Repeat with remaining eggs"]

title: Fried Eggs
description: Simple fried eggs. Classic breakfast staple.
instructions: ["Melt butter in a non-stick skillet over medium heat","Crack eggs into skillet","Cook until whites are set, about 3 minutes","For over-easy, flip and cook 1 minute more","For sunny-side up, cover and cook until whites set","Season with salt and pepper","Serve immediately"]

title: Simple Oatmeal
description: Creamy oatmeal with your favorite toppings. Healthy breakfast.
instructions: ["Bring milk and salt to a boil in a saucepan","Stir in oats","Reduce heat to medium-low","Cook for 5 minutes, stirring occasionally","Remove from heat","Stir in honey and cinnamon","Let stand for 2 minutes to thicken","Serve with fruit, nuts, or additional toppings"]

title: Breakfast Burrito
description: Eggs, cheese, and fillings wrapped in a tortilla. Portable breakfast.
instructions: ["Cook bacon until crispy, set aside","Scramble eggs with butter, salt, and pepper","Warm tortillas in a dry skillet","Lay tortillas flat","Divide scrambled eggs between tortillas","Top with bacon, cheese, bell pepper, and salsa","Fold in sides and roll tightly","Serve immediately or wrap for later"]

title: Buttered Toast with Jam
description: Classic toast with butter and sweet jam. Simple comfort.
instructions: ["Toast bread until golden brown","Spread butter on hot toast","Spread jam over butter","Serve immediately"]

title: Breakfast Sandwich
description: Egg and cheese sandwich. Handheld morning meal.
instructions: ["Cook bacon until crispy","Fry or scramble eggs to your liking","Season eggs with salt and pepper","Toast and butter English muffins","Layer egg on bottom half of muffin","Top with cheese and bacon","Close with top half of muffin","Serve hot"]

title: Veggie Omelette
description: Omelette packed with vegetables. Healthy breakfast option.
instructions: ["Sauté bell pepper, onion, and mushrooms in half the butter for 5 minutes","Season vegetables and set aside","Whisk eggs with salt and pepper","Melt remaining butter in skillet","Pour in half the eggs","Cook until edges set","Add half the vegetables and cheese to one side","Fold omelette","Cook 1 more minute","Repeat with remaining eggs"]

title: Garlic Bread
description: Crispy garlic bread with butter and herbs. Perfect side for pasta.
instructions: ["Preheat oven to 200°C (400°F)","Slice bread in half lengthwise","Mix softened butter with minced garlic, parsley, and salt","Spread garlic butter mixture on bread","Place on baking sheet","Bake for 8-10 minutes until golden and crispy","Slice and serve hot"]

title: Mashed Potatoes
description: Creamy mashed potatoes. Classic comfort side dish.
instructions: ["Place cubed potatoes in a large pot","Cover with cold water and add salt","Bring to a boil","Cook for 15-20 minutes until very tender","Drain well","Return potatoes to pot","Add butter and milk","Mash until smooth and creamy","Season with salt and pepper","Serve hot"]

title: Roasted Vegetables
description: Caramelized roasted vegetables. Healthy and flavorful side.
instructions: ["Preheat oven to 220°C (425°F)","Cut all vegetables into similar-sized pieces","Place vegetables on a large baking sheet","Drizzle with olive oil","Sprinkle with garlic powder, thyme, salt, and pepper","Toss to coat evenly","Spread in a single layer","Roast for 25-30 minutes, stirring halfway","Vegetables should be tender and caramelized","Serve hot"]

title: Steamed Rice
description: Perfectly fluffy white rice. Essential side dish.
instructions: ["Rinse rice in cold water until water runs clear","Combine rice, water, and salt in a pot","Bring to a boil over high heat","Reduce heat to low","Cover with tight-fitting lid","Simmer for 18 minutes without lifting lid","Remove from heat","Let stand covered for 5 minutes","Fluff with a fork","Serve hot"]

title: Sautéed Green Beans
description: Crisp-tender green beans with garlic. Quick vegetable side.
instructions: ["Trim ends from green beans","Melt butter in a large skillet over medium-high heat","Add green beans","Sauté for 7-8 minutes until crisp-tender","Add minced garlic","Cook for 1-2 minutes until fragrant","Squeeze lemon juice over beans","Season with salt and pepper","Toss to coat","Serve immediately"]

title: Simple Coleslaw
description: Crispy cabbage slaw with tangy dressing. Refreshing side.
instructions: ["Shred cabbage and carrots finely","Place in a large bowl","In a small bowl, whisk mayonnaise, vinegar, sugar, salt, and pepper","Pour dressing over cabbage mixture","Toss until evenly coated","Refrigerate for at least 30 minutes before serving","Toss again before serving"]

title: Roasted Broccoli
description: Crispy roasted broccoli with parmesan. Addictive vegetable side.
instructions: ["Preheat oven to 220°C (425°F)","Cut broccoli into florets","Toss with olive oil, minced garlic, salt, and pepper","Spread on a baking sheet in a single layer","Roast for 18-20 minutes until edges are crispy","Remove from oven","Squeeze lemon juice over broccoli","Sprinkle with parmesan cheese","Serve immediately"]

title: Baked Sweet Potato
description: Simple baked sweet potato. Nutritious and naturally sweet.
instructions: ["Preheat oven to 200°C (400°F)","Scrub sweet potatoes clean","Pierce each potato several times with a fork","Place on a baking sheet","Bake for 45-60 minutes until very soft","Remove from oven and let cool slightly","Split open lengthwise","Fluff flesh with a fork","Top with butter, cinnamon, and salt","Serve hot"]
